title: Functionalized Biomimetic Carrier-Free Metal-Coordinated Nanoplatform for Multidimensional Synergistic Therapy of Breast Cancer.
abstract: Despite the increasing clinical application of combination therapy, assembling metal ions, nucleic acid therapeutics, and small-molecule chemotherapeutic agents into a single carrier-free nanoparticle remains a significant technical challenge. In this study, a three-component self-assembly was successfully achieved through synergistic π-π stacking and electrostatic interactions among copper ions (Cu
